original_text: You Israelites have seen many things, but you do not understand them. You have opened your ears to listen, but you have not really heard anything.’ You Israelites have seen many things, but you do not understand them. You have opened your ears to listen, but you have not really heard anything.’ You Israelites have seen many things, but you do not understand them. You have opened your ears to listen, but you have not really heard anything.’ You Israelites have seen many things,
korean_text: 네가 많은 것을 볼지라도 유의하지 아니하며 귀가 열려 있을지라도 듣지 아니하는도다

sentences.original_text: You Israelites have seen many things
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 이스라엘 사람들은 많은 것을 보았지만

sentences.original_text: but you do not understand them
You have opened your ears to listen
but you have not really heard anything
